required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Knowledge and Behavior Toward Early Childhood Caries
clinical_study.official_title: Oral Health Beliefs, Knowledge, and Behavioral Attitudes of Egyptian Mothers Towards Early Childhood Caries

lead_sponsor.agency: October University for Modern Sciences and Arts

clinical_study.source: October University for Modern Sciences and Arts

brief_summary.textblock: 400 mothers are at least 18 years of age who have at least a child with minimum age of 6 years or even younger will be selected from the outpatient clinics of October University for Modern Sciences and arts (MSA). The questionnaire will be administrated to obtain socio demographic information and to assess their oral health beliefs, knowledge, behaviors and the possible barriers for their accessing oral health care.

primary_outcome.measure: evaluation of the oral health beliefs, knowledge, and behavioral attitudes towards early childhood caries

intervention.description: a questionnaire evaluates the oral health beliefs, knowledge, and behaviors of a sample representing Egyptian mothers toward early childhood caries

study_pop.textblock: Mothers are at least 18 years of age who have at least a child with minimum age of 6 years or even younger will be selected from the outpatient clinics of October University for Modern Sciences and arts, Cairo city, the capital of Egypt.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- mothers are at least 18 years of age who have at least a child with minimum age of 6 years or even younger
Exclusion Criteria:
- mothers are refuse to participate in the study or sign the consent

overall_official.last_name: Naglaa I Ezz El Din, lecturer
overall_official.affiliation: October University for Modern Sciences and Arts

facility.name: October University of Modern Sciences and Arts

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: October University for Modern Sciences and Arts
